atomica.ui
Class LanguageDialog

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          java.awt.Window
              java.awt.Dialog
                  javax.swing.JDialog
                      atomica.ui.LanguageDialog
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants
public class LanguageDialog
extends javax.swing.JDialog

A Dialog which lets the user select a language. Supported languages are at the moment English and German. It receives the list of supported languages from atomica.ui.util.language.Language.

Author:
Georg Ludewig
See Also:
Serialized Form
